title: Global Search for all types of elements
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is on the site
AND Global Search field has appeared
custom_steps:
WHEN user searches for the following elements:
member name
app
event
space
document
message
blog post
bookmark
wiki
custom_expected:
THEN element appears
AND formatting is correct
AND element links to the correct relevant page.

title: Top Nav - Events button - function
custom_preconds: GIVEN that top nav is visible in the header
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on the Events button
AND user clicks on an event
custom_expected:
THEN user is redirected to that event's page

AND WHEN user clicks on "show more"
THEN user is redirected to the Global Events page.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19817)

title: Top Nav - Spaces button - function
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that top nav is visible in the header
AND user clicks on the Spaces button
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on a space in the dropdown menu
custom_expected:
THEN user is redirected to that space's page

AND WHEN user clicks on "show more"
THEN user is redirected to a list of spaces.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19818)

title: Header search function: no result
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has clicked or tapped in the the global search field in the header
custom_steps:
WHEN user types in characters (whole or partial words)
AND user hits Enter/Go/Return
AND the characters don't have a match anywhere in the InsideMLB site
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects within the same tab to a Search Results page
AND the header search field disappears
AND a new search field appears below the header bar
AND the typed characters remain in the new search field
AND 2 filter boxes appear: Asset Entries, Time
AND an empty box shows a gif of a meh face shaking its head, with a magnifying glass
AND below the gif is a message: No results were found that matched the keywords: [typed characters].
AND between the Search button and the no results box a white bold-faced label with a dark gray background might appear
AND IF the the white label appears, it reads (with colon): Did you mean:
AND next to the label is a sequence of characters similar to but not the same as the typed characters

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19228)

title: Search Results appearance, at or above 992px
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or above 992px
AND user has used the global search field in the header
AND a search results page has appeared
custom_expected:
THEN the search field has disappeared from the header
AND a new search field is at the top of the page, below the header
AND the typed characters appear in the new search field
AND next to the new search field is a red button with white border and shadow
AND the red button has a white magnifying glass icon
AND the red button has a white all-caps label: Search
AND a column of filter boxes is left aligned with the search field
AND the column has up to 7 filter boxes: Sites, Asset Entries, Tags, Categories, Folders, Users, Time (not all boxes appear for all searches)
AND to the right of that column is a wider column
AND the wider column lists documents from InsideMLB that contain the characters typed in the search field
AND the documents are separated by gray rules

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19220)

title: Search Results appearance, at or below 991px
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or below 991px
AND user has used the global search field in the header
AND a search results page has appeared
custom_expected:
THEN the search field has disappeared from the header
AND a new search field is at the top of the page, below the header
AND the typed characters appear in the new search field
AND next to the new search field is a red button with white border and shadow
AND the red button has a white magnifying glass icon
AND the red button has a white all-caps label: Search
AND stacked beneath the search element are up to 7 filter boxes: Sites, Asset Entries, Tags, Categories, Folders, Users, Time (not all boxes appear for all searches)
AND the filter boxes' left and right borders are aligned with each other
AND beneath the last filter box is a list of documents from InsideMLB that contain the characters typed in the search field
AND the documents are separated by gray rules

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19223)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19222)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19221)

title: Search Results - filter box appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has used the Header search field
AND a search results page has appeared
AND the 7 filter boxes have appeared (Sites, Asset Entries, etc.)
custom_expected:
THEN each of the 7 filter boxes has a gray header box
AND a black bold-faced header is vertically centered in the box
AND a list of filter items is below the header box
AND the header and filter items are left aligned
AND the first item in each box is light blue
AND the first items in the box are: Any Site, Any Asset, Any Tag, Any Category, Any Folder, Any User, Any Time
AND the other filter items are black
AND each filter item (except the first items) has a number in parentheses
AND the number is the count of search results within that filter item [fix to make sure this happens is in progress]

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19225)

title: Search Results - list appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has used the Header search field
AND a search results page has appeared
AND a list of search results has appeared
custom_expected:
THEN each search result has an image with a circular shape
AND each result has a dark blue bold-faced title
AND next to each title is the text: Download [the document title] in dark blue
AND below each title is a black label that is a type of document (for example, Wiki Page)
AND below each label is a summary in black
AND any summary that cuts off ends in an ellipses ...
AND a search result can have a tag beneath the summary
AND a tag is a gray lozenge with a white lower-case label
AND search results are separated by gray rules
AND no elements overlap any other

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19226)

title: Search Results - Download select
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Search Results page
AND a list of documents has appeared
AND each title has Download [title] next to it
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on a Download [title]
custom_expected:
THEN a popup appears asking download permission for the document selected (for Office documents, for example)
OR page redirects within the same page to the document that matches the selection (for .pdfs, wiki pages, bookmarks, for example)

title: Search Results - Filter item select
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Search Results page
AND the 7 filter boxes have appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on a filter item
custom_expected:
THEN the filter item turns light blue
AND the list of documents disappears
AND a shorter list appears
AND the documents that now appear correspond to the filter selected

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19227)

title: Search Results - second search
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has used the global search field in the header
AND a search results page has appeared
AND the new search field has appeared
custom_steps:
WHEN user deletes the characters in the search field
AND user types in new characters (whole or partial words)
AND user clicks or taps the red Search button
OR user hits Enter/Go/Return
custom_expected:
THEN the new characters remain in the search field
AND the first search results disappear
AND new search results appear
AND the new characters are highlighted yellow in each resulting document
AND only documents that have those characters appear in the results
AND the items in the 7 filter boxes also change

title: Search Results - second search - no result
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has used the global search field in the header
AND a search results page has appeared
AND the new search field has appeared
custom_steps:
WHEN user deletes the characters in the search field
AND user types in new characters (whole or partial words)
AND user clicks or taps the red Search button
AND the characters don't have a match anywhere in the InsideMLB site
custom_expected:
THEN the new typed characters remain in the search field
AND the first search results disappear
AND only 2 of the 7 filter boxes appear: Asset Entries, Time
AND the results list is replaced by an empty box
AND the empty box shows a gif of a meh face shaking its head, with a magnifying glass
AND below the gif is a message: No results were found that matched the keywords: [typed characters].
AND between the Search button and the no results box a white bold-faced label with a dark gray background might appear
AND IF the white label appears, it reads (with colon): Did you mean:
AND next to the label is a sequence of characters similar to but not the same as the typed characters

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19224)

title: Search Results - second search - suggested search
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has used the Header search field
AND a search results page has appeared
AND user has used the new search field
AND user typed in characters that have no match in the InsideMLB website
AND the "no results" page has appeared
AND the "Did you mean:" label has appeared
AND next to the label is a sequence of suggested characters
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the sequence of suggested characters
custom_expected:
THEN the label and the meh face gif disappear
AND all 7 side boxes appear
AND documents are listed that contain the suggested characters
AND the suggested characters are highlighted yellow in the documents' titles or summaries

custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on a search results page
custom_steps:

AND the Edit and Details buttons are not visible

title: Header search function: type and enter
custom_preconds:

AND search field appears
AND user has clicked or tapped inside the search field
custom_steps:
WHEN user types in the field (whole or partial words, letters and/or numbers)
AND user hits Enter/Go/Search
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects within the same tab to a search results page
AND the typed characters appear in the new search field
AND the typed characters are highlighted yellow in each document appearing in the results
AND the documents come from all over the Inside MLB website
AND every document title or summary contains the typed characters

title: Search for a Department Only document

custom_steps:
WHEN user searches for a document in that Department
AND the document is permissioned Department Only
custom_expected: THEN user does not see that document in the search results.

title: Test responsiveness
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on a desktop platform
custom_steps:
WHEN user decreases the viewport
AND WHEN user expands the viewport
custom_expected:
THEN all elements continue to appear on the page
AND no elements overlap any other in any viewport
AND images stay proportionate (not stretched or squished)
AND all elements function as expected.

Note: In Windows IE and Edge, Chatter images will be stretched.

AND user has clicked the Spaces button
AND the Create Space plus button is visible
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the Create Space button
custom_expected:
THEN a modal appears to create the space
AND the process has 3 pages total, that look like the photos below
AND user can successfully create a space and invite participants.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19813)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19812)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19814)

title: Top Nav - Create permissions
custom_preconds:
Department Owners and Department Users will always see the Create Space button.
A Department Owner will always see the Create Event button.
A Department User will not see the Create Event button until the User creates a Space.
If a Department User creates a Space, then the User will see the Create Event button.
